name: Cooties & Cuties
description:
Cooties & Cuties is a two player game of tag where you smooch each other! The game features character customization, 40 different levels to play in, and music from Abstraction! And it's only 2 bucks!! that's like a dollar a person <3 This game is perfect for playing with a significant other ;)

You can contact me with any questions or concerns on twitter @cbear_wallis or graham.p.sullivan@gmail.com for email

Cooties & Cuties was made a present for my awesome girlfriend! ^_^

UPDATE(1.1)

-Added: You can now Rename your characters by clicking on their names in the character creation screen and typing.

-Fixed: various little oddities
